name: Sail 10 Gold
description:
(PLAY IN FULL SCREEN)

A 3 minute game: Set sail across an island world to earn gold. Adjust course as the wind changes and beware of the pirate.

Guide:

  • Press W or cursor up to move ahead.
  • Press A/D or cursor left/right to steer.
  • Make deliveries to the island indicated by the black arrows to earn gold. The world is round, so there are always two ways to get there.
  • With 10 gold you win the game.
  • This circle around you shows the wind direction. You sail fast within the green angles (with the wind), slower in the yellow angles and you can't sail in the red angles (against the wind).
  • In normal mode avoid the pirate ship. When it gets close, its direction and distance is shown by the red arrow.
